description.fr_FR: Plugin destiné à permettre une interface entre Jeedom et les équipements connectés via les API OverKiz (Somfy TaHoma Cloud & Local, Atlantic Cozytouch, Flexom, Hexaom HexaConnect, Hitachi Hi Kumo, Nexity Eugénie, Simu (LiveIn2), Ubiwizz). Ne prend pas en charge Naviclim, Navilink, WiFi Direct.
description.de_DE: Plugin designed to allow interfacing Jeedom with equipment connected to the OverKiz API's (Somfy TaHoma Cloud & Local, Atlantic Cozytouch, Flexom, Hexaom HexaConnect, Hitachi Hi Kumo, Nexity Eugénie, Simu (LiveIn2), Ubiwizz). Not suitable for Naviclim, Navilink, WiFi Direct.
